title: Vallès Symphony Orchestra
text:
The  Orquestra Simfònica del Vallès  (Spanish: Orquesta Sinfónica de Vallés), founded in 1987, is a symphony orchestra based in Sabadell, Spain. The principal conductor of the orchestra is Xavier Puig.
